narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Children's Health System of Texas is a General Acute Care Hospital  Children provider based in Plano, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $65.8M in Medicaid payments across 218K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $65.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
